faqs.question: What are the premier maritime colleges in India?
faqs.answer: Top maritime colleges include Indian Maritime University (IMU), Directorate General of Shipping (DGS) approved institutes like Mumbai, Chennai, Kochi, Visakhapatnam, and Kolkata maritime academies. IMU Pune, Mumbai, Chennai are premier government institutions.

faqs.question: What is the admission process for maritime colleges?
faqs.answer: Admission is through IMU-CET (Common Entrance Test) for IMU affiliated colleges. Merit-based selection after qualifying entrance exam. 10+2 Science pass (Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics) is mandatory.
